name: Crate AC 16 With Fully Covered Lid
description: The Phoenix Crate AC 16 With Fully Covered Lid offers a 32-liter capacity for secure and organized storage. Durable, stackable, and available in multiple color combinations, it's perfect for various applications.

name: FLO M Pack 1 - Customizable Modular Storage for Contemporary Living
description: With dimensions of 770 mm (L) x 430 mm (W) x 1270 mm (H) and a weight of 18 kg, the FLO M Pack 1 offers ample storage without occupying excessive space. Its modular design enables you to expand or reconfigure the unit as your storage needs evolve.

name: FLO S PACK 4
description: With dimensions of 1500 mm (L) x 430 mm (W) x 490 mm (H) and a weight of 13 kg, the FLO S Pack 4 offers ample storage without occupying excessive space. Its modular design enables you to expand or reconfigure the unit as your storage needs evolve.

name: FLO S PACK 1
description: With dimensions of 770 mm (L) x 430 mm (W) x 490 mm (H) and a weight of 8.5 kg, the FLO S Pack 1 offers ample storage without occupying excessive space. Its modular design enables you to expand or reconfigure the unit as your storage needs evolve.

name: Drawer Classic - 6 Pcs
description: Ideal for storing stationery, craft supplies, cosmetics, tools, or kitchen items, these drawers help you maximize space in any room. The compact size allows you to place them on desks, shelves, or countertops without taking up too much room. Each drawer slides out smoothly for easy access to your belongings.

name: Duo Chair
description: The Duo Chair combines sleek design with practical functionality, offering a comfortable seating solution for two. Perfect for waiting areas, offices, or casual settings, this chair features a robust frame that supports everyday use while maintaining a modern aesthetic.

name: Shoe Rack 4 Layers
description: Crafted from durable materials with a sleek and minimal design, the 4-tier shoe rack accommodates multiple pairs of shoes, boots, slippers, or sandals in one convenient place. Its open-frame structure allows for proper ventilation, preventing odor build-up and helping your shoes stay fresh longer.

name: Barrel 20L
description: The Phoenix Barrel 20L offers a practical and robust solution for your storage needs. With its compact size, it’s ideal for managing household waste, storing dry goods, or organizing tools and supplies. Crafted from high-quality plastic, this barrel ensures longevity and ease of maintenance. Its lightweight design (0.6 kg) and dimensions (34 × 34 × 39 cm) make it suitable for various spaces, both indoors and outdoors

name: Laddy (Towel Holder)
description: Crafted from durable, high-quality plastic, the holder is resistant to moisture, stains, and daily wear. Its freestanding design means no drilling or mounting is required—just place it where needed. The Laddy Towel Holder is ideal for holding hand towels, washcloths, or dish towels, whether on your countertop, near the sink, or in a guest bathroom

name: Cala Foldable Comfort Chair
description: The Cala Foldable Comfort Chair from Phoenix Industries is your versatile seating solution that effortlessly combines style, comfort, and portability. Whether you’re hosting guests indoors or enjoying the outdoors, this chair adapts to your needs with ease. Its foldable design ensures convenient storage and transport, making it ideal for various settings—from urban apartments to beachside gatherings.

name: Chair Breeze
description: Embrace the essence of coastal relaxation with the Phoenix Chair Breeze. Designed to evoke the serenity of a gentle sea breeze under tropical palms, this chair offers a refreshing seating experience for both indoor and outdoor settings
